subject: Order Status Inquiry – Order #SSN5614
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Support Team,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m writing to check on the current status of my
order, order number #SSN5614.

Could you please let me know if there are any updates regarding its
processing or expected delivery? If you need any additional information
from me, I’d be happy to provide it.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

Frederico Antunes

conversations.body_text: Hi Frederico Antunes,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
